Messages.CloseFailed: The application is still running.\nClose it manually or force it's closure.
Messages.ForceFailed: An error occured while trying to force the closure of the application.
Messages.ContinueClose: Do you wish to continue the closure of the rest of the applications?

Debug.caption: Information about windows of detected applications

Message.KillWarning:
Warning!

Forcing the closure of an application may affect your data.
It is therefore preferable to leave the application normally.

Are you sure you want to force the shutdown of this program?
